caption.p: Effects of 12a and 10 µM paclitaxel on the calculated maximum reaction rate (V max) of in vitro microtubule formation. Control: untreated samples. The experiment was performed in two parallels and the measurements were repeated twice. Each bar denotes the mean ± SEM, n = 4. ns, * and ***indicate p > 0.05, p < 0.05 and p < 0.001, respectively, compared with the control values.
